graph

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.Link
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Link
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    represents links between nodes in Graph objects.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Link

        Link(int id,
    Node in,
    Node out)
throws ParallelException
        public constructor. Assigns a default weight of one to this Link object.
        Parameters:
        id - int
        in - Node
        out - Node
        Throws:
        ParallelException - if the current thread has a read-lock on the in Node and there exists another thread that also has a read-lock on the in Node.

      • Link

        Link(Graph g,
    int id,
    int starta,
    int enda,
    double weight)
throws ParallelException
        public constructor.
        Parameters:
        g - Graph
        id - int
        starta - int
        enda - int
        weight - double
        Throws:
        ParallelException - if the current thread has a read-lock on the Node with id starta, and there exists another thread that simultaneously holds the same read-lock.
